jacket.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the part of a suit that covers the top part of your body
jacket.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Gene has to wear a jacket and tie to work.
jacket.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a stiff piece of folded paper that fits over the cover of a book to protect it
jacket.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a stiff paper cover that protects a record
jacket.translation[0].definitions[4].def: a cover that surrounds and protects some types of machines
